tool_description: Validates payment disputes and transactions against regulatory compliance requirements and industry standards.

transaction_data.description: JSON string containing transaction details for validation

jurisdiction.description: Legal jurisdiction: US, EU, UK, CA, AU, or international

merchant_category.description: Merchant category code for industry-specific rules

validation_level.description: Validation depth: basic, standard, or comprehensive

error_messages: Invalid transaction data: The transaction_data JSON is malformed or missing required fields. Ensure proper JSON formatting and include all mandatory transaction details.
Unsupported compliance framework: One or more frameworks in compliance_frameworks are not recognized. Use valid frameworks like PCI-DSS, GDPR, PSD2, etc.
Invalid jurisdiction: Use one of [US, EU, UK, CA, AU, international]. Ensure jurisdiction matches the merchant's operating region.
Unknown merchant category: The merchant_category code is not recognized. Provide a valid MCC (Merchant Category Code) for proper rule application.
usage: Provide transaction_data as JSON string, specify compliance_frameworks array, jurisdiction, and merchant_category to validate regulatory compliance. Adjust validation_level for different audit depths.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status: compliant, non_compliant, or warning

risk_score.description: Compliance risk score from 0 (low risk) to 100 (high risk)

recommendations.description: Recommended actions to address compliance issues
